review_data.title: Idaplatz locals hangout
review_data.content: My lovely Calvados bartender was a friendly young lady running the bar. She was playing rap music, but some of the Stammtisch guys wanted something a little different and she offered some Justin Bieber, which they declined, so we went right to some rock music....More

review_data.title: Good drinks, hot inside
review_data.content: Been here yesterday with friends. Drinks are good and music was good too. It's was very hot inside, unfortunately fresh air ok inside was not forthcoming

review_data.title: Excellent cocktails and long drinks
review_data.content: Friendly waiters, good selection of cocktails and it’s nice to hang out outside with the good season, will come back!

review_data.title: Decent sport bar
review_data.content: Went there for a France-Germany soccer game Would not go for a regular evening, but for a sport evening it is pretty good. Tables can be booked in advance (so one can seat( Good choice of beer Decent bar food (the flamekueche was pretty good,...More

review_data.title: Apero simpatico
review_data.content: Adoro questa birra Brooklyn lager quindi per me è solo un grande piacere venire a berne alcune su questa meraviglia...More

review_data.title: super Kneipe
review_data.content: Immer wieder gerne, tolle Sportsbar mit super Bedienungen, leckeren Getränken und freundlichen Gästen. Absolutes Muss rund um den Idaplatz!More

review_data.title: unkompliziert
review_data.content: Eigentlich eine Sports Bar, dementsprechend laufen auch öfters die Fernseher in der Bar. Man fühlt sich aber auch wohl wenn...More

review_data.title: Stimmungsvoll...
review_data.content: Hier kann man in einer lauen Sommernacht den ein oder anderen Wein....oder Bier...oder irgendwas...:) ...in gemütlicher Atmosphäre geniessen....Nette, flotte Bedienung....!

review_data.title: Schöne Gartenanlage
review_data.content: Le Calvados hat eine tolle Gartenanlage für Sonnentage. Der Service ist freundlich und zuvorkommend.More

review_data.title: Nice bar for sports and sitting outside in summer
review_data.content: Calvados is a good place to go watch football, in particular the Bundesliga, and in the spring and summer it's also great for sitting outside and enjoying a drink. The square (Idaplatz) in front of the bar fills up (in the good way) over the...More

review_data.title: Great outdoor seating
review_data.content: I really like this relaxed bar at Idaplatz. They offer some light snacks of which my favorite is the sausage and cheese platter. I especially love coming here in summer, when you can sit outside but it is also worth a visit on cold and...More

review_data.title: Immer wieder
review_data.content: Tolles lokales (schweizerisches) Live Sport Programm von Fussball bis Tennis dazu eine tolle Bierauswahl mit einer sehr schmackhaften kleinen Karte....More

review_data.title: Sports bar with nice outdoor square seating
review_data.content: This is a nice sports bar that also offers a light food menu of pizza, calzones, and sausage/cheese platter and of course beverages. La Calvados is located at Idaplatz and the closest Tram stop is Lochergut, then walk two blocks west. The bar has high...More

review_data.title: Egal ob wir jevern oder wursten - Im calvados muss niemand dursten!
review_data.content: Hipster trifft man hier nur zum sommerlichen Latte Macchiato nachmittags um 4 auf der wunderschönen, mit süssen Pflänzchen versehenen Terasse....More

review_data.title: Unnötig
review_data.content: Unfreundliche Bedienung, es sei denn man kennt die coolen, hippen Barkeeper. Ein Ort für Szenies und Hippster. Mache einen grossen...More
